ref: 12046 vīṭī f. ʻ the betel plant Piper betel ʼ lex., vīṭaka -- m. ʻ roll of betel ʼ Pañcad., ˚ṭikā -- f. Daś. [Poss. ← Drav., cf. Tam. veṟṟ -- ilai, Kota vetl: DED 4539. -- See vīṭā -- ]
N. biri ʻ seeds of the creeper Paederia foetida (used for cleaning teeth) ʼ; O
Aw. bīrī f. ʻ a substance for cleaning the teeth ʼ.
